reviewTitle: They didn't inform me of the price
reviewDescription: I was looking at study.com and signed up, it asked me to put in my credit card information without ever asking me about a plan or letting me know it would charge me $235.  Them not having a phone number just adds icing to the cake I have had to contact my bank account and dispute the charge.

Discounts - I logged into Grammarly and tried the beginning of a practice test.  I was unable to get back to it, and it won't let me retake the "free" test.  That is not my problem.  I subsequently received an email offering a discount for my first month.  I was unable to find the discount code, and following the link I was provided led me to a cart that only offered the full price. It included a place for a coupon code, but since I was unable to find one, I was unable to utilize the discount.  I have contacted customer service, but after sending a screenshot of the email, I received no response. I also sent a follow-up email.  I had a week off at the beginning of the month to study for a test to obtain my teaching license this fall, but I should have taken it already.  I wish I could pay full price, but I am unable to at this time.  I was supposed to receive a grant, and that also did not come through.  It would be nice if they honored their own advertisements.  I also found the first month free offer, which I was told was only offered in the form of a refund if you were not satisfied.  Seems very deceptive.  I think they know what they are doing.

Katie McClellan's narration completely ruins the learning experience on Study.com. Her delivery is robotic and performative, filled with vocal fry that makes the lessons grating and hard to follow. She brings no subject expertise or teaching presence, and the result feels artificial and disconnected. Study.com need to replace her with an actual instructor or a qualified academic narrator to restore the credibility and clarity these courses deserve.

I accidentally bought their ‚Äúfree trial‚Äù just to try only to realise that it wasn‚Äôt actually a free trial and i must i‚Äôve missed the part about it being paid, so i was charged 5.99 USD (10.94 NZD). I contacted their customer service about the accident and they replied sounding really nice and said they would give me a refund. I thanked them and waited a few days for my refund, then i sent another email since i still hadn‚Äôt received it and they said they‚Äôd forward my request so i get it faster. Then i waited more and emailed them a couple more times on later days, and they just stopped replying to me and i still don‚Äôt have my refund.

this is not a good place to complete credits, they spend A LOT of time grading your projects and they flag you as if you use AI even if you haven't just go with sophia they're amazing this site sucks and also overprice for what they offer

reviewTitle: This is a really crap company yakes‚Ä¶
reviewDescription: This is a really crap company yakes your money and dies not do what they say they will. Completed a class that I needed for graduation and 4 months later still do not have my transcripts

Updated
I enrolled in Study.com believing the subscription included everything needed to finish my courses. However, one of my classes suddenly required an unexpected third-party paid platform that was not listed anywhere in the syllabus or terms of service. I only discovered the charge after clicking into the assignment.

When I contacted support, an agent named Stacey R. admitted the issue and promised I‚Äôd be exempt from the extra fee, saying they‚Äôd clarify this for future students. That exemption was never honored.

After that, communication became almost nonexistent. They promise a two-day turnaround on responses, but most of my cases went unanswered for a week or longer ‚Äî and even when I did get replies, many weren‚Äôt properly addressed or resolved. Some tickets are still partially unanswered weeks later.

I was also soft-locked out of assignments, received auto-generated rejection emails claiming ‚Äúmissing key portions,‚Äù and even watched human-graded submissions get marked ‚Äúincomplete‚Äù within minutes ‚Äî proving they were never actually read.

When the issue was finally adjusted, they did fix the correct class ‚Äî but they also interfered with another course I was still working on, marking it as failed in the process. My grades were not calculated correctly, and one assignment still shows as pending despite all work being finished.

On top of that, I can‚Äôt save updates to my account because their system flags my legal last name as profanity, which I verified with my driver‚Äôs license. Support acknowledged it but never resolved it.

Overall, I‚Äôve dealt with hidden fees, broken grading, poor communication, and unkept promises. I‚Äôm still waiting on multiple unresolved tickets and BBB responses.

This company is a complete joke. I will never do business with them again, and anyone considering Study.com should proceed with extreme caution.

Updated
The problem was acknowledged and I have been refunded which makes me in a better mood but does not change my overall opinion

Their website states that a 29.99 MONTHLY BILLING would gain me access to ALL VIDEOS and course descriptions. Their videos gave me less than half of their time before asking for a 59.99 MONTHLY subscription???? How is this legal? What a waste of time and money. FALSE ADVERTISEMENT. They are out here scamming broke college students for real.

I was suffering with cyclic quadrilateral and the video that I saw from study.com helped me a lot.
I know the video may seem childish but quality matters not quantity.

After entering my phone number and email to see pricing for the SAT course, I was sent emails and texts for discounts, despite the fact that I didn‚Äôt buy their service. Made me feel quite scammed and invaded, as I was forced to enter my info just to see their pricing. I suggest freely listing pricing, or not sending promos if you force potential customers to give info for service info. Discouraged me from ever buying anything from the company, and will probably do the same to others.

reviewTitle: I purchased this because I was taking the Praxis Exam for Business Edcation
reviewDescription: I purchased this because I was taking the Praxis exam to get my alternative teaching certificate in Business Education.  The Praxis study material on study.com was nothing like the actual Praxis exam.  I am an excellent test taker and ended up passing the exam with an exceptionally high score but it had very little to do with the preparation that I completed via study.com. If I was a person that struggled with taking tests, the differences would have been debilitating. Some of the content offered was beneficial but the style and formatting of the questions was completely different on the actual Praxis exam.

reviewTitle: Worth your money if you‚Äôd like to graduate early
reviewDescription: I can‚Äôt speak for others but I took 2 classes on this website and really didn‚Äôt have issues. I will say though, like others, I agree that getting your assignments graded took a little while. But all in all I had no problems transferring and applying my credits.

reviewTitle: Scam, waste of time and money
reviewDescription: Study.com did not deliver a single piece of their service for me. I didn't get all of the credits I earned, and they never sent out my transcripts. When I attempted to address these issues, multiple times I might add, I never got a response from a member of this support staff. I didn't even get an automated response. Don't waste your money, study.com is a scam.

It‚Äôs honestly so frustrating when I just want to learn something and I‚Äôm immediately hit with a sign-up wall. I don‚Äôt need an account, a password, or a hundred confirmation emails‚ÄîI just want quick access to the information. It turns what should be a simple learning experience into an annoying chore.

reviewTitle: Avoid Study.com at All Costs. A Complete Nightmare Experience
reviewDescription:
I have never had such a frustrating and dishonest experience with an online education platform. My subscription ended on June 19, but I had submitted all my assignments well before that date. The moment my subscription ended, I was hit with false accusations designed to force me into resubscribing just to resubmit the very same work I had already completed.

I fought tooth and nail to get my assignments graded without giving them more money. They eventually marked them, but then refused to release my final grade. It is now August 13 and I have still received no response. Because of this deliberate delay, I missed both my July and August deadlines to transfer my courses to WGU.

Their so-called ‚Äúsupport‚Äù is a joke. They have no phone support whatsoever and their email support is nonexistent, sometimes taking three weeks to respond, sometimes never. I have sent multiple emails with no reply.

Study.com‚Äôs business practices are predatory and unethical. They hold your work hostage to squeeze more money from you and they clearly do not care about your academic goals. If you value your time, money, and sanity, stay far away from Study.com.

Pretty slow at grading, and the support is lackluster. Been waiting almost 2 weeks for an assignment grade, and my exam grade changed from a 98% to a pending. I tried to complete this before my ended monthly payment and they pushed the grading until the day after. So now I have submitted the assignment and I can‚Äôt even see if or when it will be graded.

reviewTitle: Absolutely horrible company and I will‚Ä¶
reviewDescription:
Absolutely horrible company and I will never do business with them again!  I highly suggest you don‚Äôt either! 
My daughter completed the course with study.com  2 1/2 weeks before her financial check in deadline and still they have not graded/sent transcripts to her university. 
Because of study.com she won‚Äôt be able to walk at graduation and will need to wait an entire YEAR!!!!! 
Completely unacceptable 
She‚Äôs worked her butt off and study.com has completely failed!!!

reviewTitle: I was tempted to change my credit card
reviewDescription:
It's impossible to get off their automatic billing. I've done it 3 times. They're sneaky assholes and never refund. They just go, "Okay, but we'll cancel it next month." We'll see if it ACTUALLY comes off the third time.

My guess is the techs either aren't doing their job right or set up a loophole the people in between can't get around on purpose. You take people's money when they're trying to save, any review is just going to be knocked down to 1. It's ironic coming from a place trying to make you smarter.

This is 2025 reviews: Study.com is Scam for students biggest scam is there policy for transferring collage credit take another whole subscription and same as grading period, so you gonna get out 1 tuition pay for whole subscription its to expensive and professors is not knowledgeable at all I got good for final and everything but the assignment they are 300 points so even you do good in final their assignments  is a lot and not easy to submit assignment  your grader well keep sending your assignments back to you because small mistake and thats 60 percent down on your grade‚Ä¶ so Be Aware study.com know that students save but you end up paying their more costumer services not responding until next subscription‚Ä¶.  So you gonna end up paying $990 just to get one course out!!! Trust me they knew how to get your money well!  So if you doit do it in your own risk! JUST TO LET ANYONE KNOW THE TRUTH BEHIND STUDY.COM


They hire professionals so they need your money to pay them either way they well find a way!! I finish my classes month ago but ti need to keep subscription 3 times to just wait for them to grade and transfer and see the whole grade..

Excelent echange avec Matilda.
Merci pour votre aide.

The classes are good. The service is AWFUL. There is no way to speak with an actual human unless you call them out on social media, leave multiple voicemails to their direct-to-voicemail support line, and send multiple support tickets and emails, and threaten with a BBB complaint

Example 1 - I finished a course and was locked out of the final exam. They incorrectly input my assignment scores (50/50, 71/75, 67/75) as percentages: 50%, 71% and 67% respectively. It took 8 DAYS of the above tactics to finally get someone to tell me ‚Äúoh it‚Äôs a backend issue, and there is no final exam‚Äù despite the course clearly listing a final exam

Example 2:
My transfer credit deadline was June 3rd. I completed everything by June 2nd. Grading at study.com has never taken more than a few hours at most, usually assignment grades take less than an hour or two to get back. I finished a course and was graded on assignments 1 & 3 within minutes. Waited until past my deadline for assignment 2 to be graded and it still hasn‚Äôt been. I even reuploaded assignment 3 with assignment 2 attached, and a txt file titled ‚ÄúURGENT ASSIGNMENT 2 STILL HAS NOT BEEN GRADED‚Äù, and they regraded my assignment 3 literally minutes later without touching assignment 2

I am now past my transfer credit deadline while having paid their monthly fee three times (as well as multiple extra exams for $70 each) with nothing other than another automated response. I‚Äôve looped in my college, and will be filing a BBB complaint and refund from my credit card for failure to deliver service

Tr√®s bonne √©change avec Matilda.
Qui a su me r√©pondre a toutes questions
Merci Matilda

Very good program over all. I was able to pass all 13 CLEP tests I took in large part due to the lessons I took on study.com. I would recommend the program to anyone who is good at self-study. When I was done with my CLEPs, I ended my subscription without any hassle.

Don't use it - they won't cancel your subscription when you're done.

I have an email telling me I canceled 4 months ago but I'm still getting billed $60 per month.  You can't contact customer service - all you can do is leave a message or send an email.  Four months with no resolution is totally unacceptable!

reviewTitle: Best resource for SHRM-CP study and prep!
reviewDescription: Using this resource helped me tremendously with SHRM-CP prep. Along with one other resource, this was my main study guide, and I passed my SHRM-CP!

I've been experiencing issues with Study.com for two months now. The website has repeatedly prevented me from taking the Final Exam due to various technical reasons. Despite numerous attempts to resolve the problem, their customer support either cannot grasp the issue or simply isn't interested in addressing it. As of now, the issue remains unresolved, and I am still being charged $235 monthly without any resolution.

This level of service is unacceptable, and I would strongly caution others before using their platform. It‚Äôs incredibly frustrating to be stuck in this situation with no support or clear solution.

I was wrongly accused of using AI on an assignment, and despite providing detailed answers to their questions, Study.com has completely ignored me for nearly a month. I've sent multiple follow-up emails requesting updates, and they've simply gone silent. The longer they decide not to respond, the more money they can take from me through the subscription. Their customer service is nonexistent. I've both emailed and called them. Avoid this company if you value your time and money.
Free? then its $239.   i just googled a question about the universe and these lunatics want $239.

reviewTitle: Study.com is a great source to do‚Ä¶
reviewDescription: Study.com is a great source to do classes and have the credit transfer but beware! They do not have a customer service for you to reach out just in case you have concerns. They can take up to two weeks to grade your assignments and it could take up to three weeks for them just to have your transcript ready. But if you have any concerns or questions, it is really hard to get those answered because there is no customer service. No live representative. You can talk to. Yes there is a customer service phone number online but when you call, it‚Äôs just for you to leave a voice message. Nothing more.

reviewTitle: Their Algebra class assumes you know‚Ä¶
reviewDescription: Their Algebra class assumes you know every step. For example, when they bring a math problem, they don't explain step by step how they get to the solution. They'll skip from step 2 to 5 assuming you know steps 3 and 4. Very annoying because I have spend hours figuring out steps 3 and 4 on my own.

reviewTitle: you have to create a account to see‚Ä¶
reviewDescription: you have to create a account to see your answer , which means you have to pay and get emails etc .

reviewTitle: Lord Budha's Birth Place is Nepal üá≥üáµ
reviewDescription:
In the Study.com; I've seen Wrong Mesaage- where its written about the Siddhartha Gautam -Lord Budha:  was an ancient Indian Prince which is 100% wrong because Siddhartha Gautam -Lord Budha's Birth place is Kapilvastu in Lumbini which is  in Nepal üá≥üáµ not in India.

So, He was a Nepali Prince, But not the Indian Prince, this kind of wrong messages should be amended and the correct mesages with facts should be inserted to spread the right mesages to the readers. 
Please, write the factual mesages from the right source which which has got authenticated evidence.
Truth is always truth no one can hide the factual thing forever. üôèüèæ

Study.com has been an incredible resource for my education journey! I‚Äôve successfully completed three courses on the platform and am currently preparing for my final exams. The lessons are well-structured, clear, and break down complex topics in a way that‚Äôs easy to grasp.

The flexibility to learn at my own pace has been a game changer for balancing school with my other responsibilities, like being a wife, mother and full time employee. I also appreciate how user-friendly the platform is, and the practice quizzes have been invaluable in helping me feel confident before exams.

Their customer service is top-notch as well. Any time I‚Äôve had a question, they‚Äôve responded quickly and with helpful solutions. Overall, Study.com has been an affordable and effective way for me to earn credits and stay on track with my goals. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a flexible and supportive learning platform!

They hide that the cost to sign up is recurring each month in the terms and service fine print. I was charged for 4 months and only used it for 1 week. Why not just be honest and make it clearly known when someone is signing up?

reviewTitle: Click and bait - Worth ZERO - Don't waste your $
reviewDescription: Click and bait type of scam business. I was looking for courses to learn the basics of the French language. They showed me a video with all the pronunciations. I thought, wow, I clicked for a free one-week trial to check it out, and out of nowhere, they charged me $5.95 for the week. When I checked again, the offer was special, and instead of $30, they gave you a week of nonsense for $5.95. And, to make it worse, they had nothing, just one offer of some blah blah they put together as 16 chapters, 262 lessons, and only 6 of these chapters had videos of 2-4 minutes of cartoons talking. You will get two hundred sixty-two silly lessons free of Google. I will dispute the charges with PayPal with all proofs of nonsense.

reviewTitle: I saved time & money using Study.com to complete prerequisites
reviewDescription: When I decided to change careers, I was looking for the most economical way to earn my Ohio teaching license.  I decided that the best path for me would be to complete a Masters of Teaching program through WGU, but before I could be admitted to the program I needed to complete a few more prerequisite courses.  Study.com made the process extremely easy.  I knew before I started my courses that they would be approved for transfer and fulfill my requirements. I was able to earn college credit from home quickly so that I could start my program with WGU after only a couple months instead of waiting semesters.

After completing my third practice test, the score was not applied. The system shows that I did not complete the test (inaccurate) but it won't let me access the test. Not to mention the test content is all the same. I don't believe this course properly prepares someone for the actual praxis test. I want a refund. Unfortunately I finished the course and it seems that voids the free trial opportunity. Furthermore, I reported a technical glitch with my account claiming that I was unable to take anymore practice tests or finish one that I started even though my subscription was still valid. Nothing was done about it. I unsubscribed.

Great resources but 30$ a month is alot and I canceled the first day after my monthly charge. It says they will charge me next month. I had to go through the cancle prossess 2 times for it to acknowledged I canceled. I am 90 percent sure I went through the canceling process last month too but they didn't cancel my subscription then either.

reviewTitle: I recently ordered an educational kids‚Ä¶
reviewDescription: I recently ordered an educational kids activity bundle for $9.99 on November 1, 2024.  Have not received it.  Yet, they sure took the money right out of my account plus an additional ten cents.  It was supposed to be Free all I had to do was pay Shipping.  When will I get the order.  Bought for us to use for my granddaughter.   Disappointed.  Was this a scam?
Study.com was exactly what I needed to use when preparing for the Library Media GACE.

reviewTitle: Being mis charged after pause since August 2024 to today
reviewDescription: My son used this study.com during summer break, as he is very self-driven always seeking more to study. I paused subscription in August when busy school year starting. However today I just received email from Studay.com asking me to update my payment information. as they failed attempted charge for December 2024. that's how I found out they continued charge me after my Pause/August. I'm request refund for September - November 2024 charge $59.99 x 3month= $179.97. waiting for response from study.com. I will update my review after I receive response.

reviewTitle: Avoid Assignments that Are Subjectively Graded
reviewDescription:
For the last several years I've reached out to Study.com demonstrating that there are real errors in their proctored exams. And to this day, those questions have not been corrected. Also, I would recommend students to avoid any course that requires submitted assignments that use subjective grading rather than objective grading. The former is where one's assignment is based on a reviewer's opinion rather than say (3+5=8). Unfortunately, all too often in academia a person's demographic is taken into consideration with grading. All things being equal, if your name is John Anderson and another student is Jawakatima Johnson, John will automatically earn a grade lower than Jawakatima. 

The other thing that must be noted is that Study.com pays people for their positive reviews on Trustpilot and BBB through their Ambassador program.

Study.com provides thorough and relevant information to help you succeed in your field of study. I passed the Special Education exams on my first attempt. I will continue to use Study.com for continuing education.
This site was very helpful! I was able to pass my desired courses on the first try!

reviewTitle: Study.com has changed my life as busy‚Ä¶
reviewDescription: Study.com has changed my life as busy mum of 2.  Im working on my degree while taking courses using Study.com. 15 min a day to work on my courses.  Am happy I found study.com.

reviewTitle: One week to study and I passed!
reviewDescription: Pleased with the ease of the app. I had one week to study and pass the GACE and I did! Almost a perfect score as a matter of fact.
The videos helped me because I am a visual and auditory learner.

reviewTitle: I enjoyed the interactiveness of the‚Ä¶
reviewDescription: I enjoyed the interactiveness of the program.
Very helpful for understanding whatever material is being studied.
The program prepared me well for the National Counselor Exam!  It is thorough and well organized

reviewTitle: Study.com provided me with a way to‚Ä¶
reviewDescription: Study.com provided me with a way to complete a lot of prerequisites I needed in a very fast-paced manner. I challenged myself with a short timeline, but I was able to accomplish my goal because of how easy Study.com makes it to set your own pace. I had a great experience and now I am ready to finish my degree.

reviewTitle: The training program was easy to follow‚Ä¶
reviewDescription: The training program was easy to follow and had all the necessary topics  covered for a successful testing day.
This has great study guides and lessons to learn from. I like how they have quizzes after each topic as well.
Super helpful, easy learning system. Very user friendly and the support network is great.

An excellent website, really useful, especially the videos.

reviewDescription: Wating over 2 weeks to get something graded. Why is it so hard to get that anwser. I paid extra 70 to take it. Funny how I won't get a anwser till after the 200 monthly subscription fee charged again.
